{{< include /guide/model-validation/_risk-areas.qmd >}}

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

1. Under Workplace Settings, select **Risk Areas & Validation Guidelines**.

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Risk Area**.

1. Provide a **[name]{.smallcaps}** and **[description]{.smallcaps}** for your risk area.

1. Click **Add Risk Area** to create your risk area.

    After you save, confirm that your risk area was added to the list in alphabetical order.
